data.title: The Singapore Exchange suspends PJSC Gazprom from Trading and what does the Singapore Exchange expect from issuers in relation to sanctions
data.meta_description: On 7 March, the Singapore Exchange (“SGX“) suspended the admission to trading of PJSC Gazprom’s global depository receipts due to sanctions imposed on Russia by the Singapore Government. Gazprom is a Russian oil and gas company in which the Russian government has a controlling interest (including both direct and indirect ownership) of more than 50
